item.description:
Yeah.... the dumpster is gone.. house is still under construction but we can get into the backyard.... and the hallway is done so that we can walk through to the living room without going through my bedroom... lol... So the plan is to have our annual halloween party/parade on sat. the 21st at 2:00 rain date will be on the 28th......... so dress your babies up and lets all have a good laugh.... please rsvp...... pug hugs Patty

If anyone has ideas for our group I would love to hear from you... it is our group....... and your ideas are always welcome.

group.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group

item.name: Halloween Party/Parade
